review: I cannot even rate the actual value of this item even though I have had two sent to me. The first apparently had an identical serial number as someone else's product and therefore could not be registered. It had to be returned. The reconditioned replacement would not even turn on because it had old software. It had to be returned too. I have spent two hours 'using' these two items and was never even able to get to the home screen. Incredibly frustrating. Would give 0 stars if possible.
author: Ann

review: only difficulty was opening remote to install battery but got instructions on Youtube.  The second firestick ordered was easier to open
author: stan

review: a way to reboot the stick when it locks up would be helpful
author: Craig A Parker

review: Fire stick works great...a little disappointed in the Netflix selections
author: Dave Homsher

review: Wow, Wow, Wow... I absolutely Love My Amazon Fire Stick!
author: Mary Garza

review: It worked fine after I got it set up.  The instructions are woefully inadequate.
author: Bruce A. Florquist "scribbler"

review: The fire stick is great easy to set up  and even easier to use.
